title: For Sale: T206 Uzit Merkle SGC 40 SOLD
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: For Sale: T206 Uzit Merkle SGC 40 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
SGC 40 Merkle Throwing Uzit has been sold, Thanks
Emails have priority, email address is below.  EDIT: Looks much better than the scan, as I have a hard time with the SGC holders.  I think this was from the REA Uzit thing a few years ago.  This is not the one sold earlier this summer in one of the auction house things, just an FYI.
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

EDIT:
Since the last round of silver cash and trade offers worked out very well (thanks guys!), I will put the offer in this thread also.

Will also trade for 1964 or earlier silver coins

Hey Bobby,

This was from your original backs line, wasn't it?  Sorry to see you part with it (especially since I don't have the $$ to buy it from you!) but hope your sale goes well.

Best Regards,
Craig

Words of wisdom:
Termites will attack, water pipes will busts, and always buy the extended warranty on European sports cars!  Not very often that all of these things happen within a couple months of each other...
Bob

Just a little bump, with the upcoming move.  I will be sending all the contents of the house north, so buying selling will be shut down in couple weeks.
Most all left overs from the backs line will be going to the fall auctions.
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
